utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So the wedding caterer sent me this list of twelve appetizers and I have to narrow it down to six.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Food? Uh-huh gimme!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So did Monica tell you about this great band called the Swing Kings that we’re trying to get to play at the wedding?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Since when are you into swing music?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh since forever! I used to go all over town listening to bands!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Gap commercial. So did you book them? Did you call?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I will.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do you want me to call?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, I’ll do it. You just stick to your job.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What is your job?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Staying out of the way.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This is impossible Monica, why don’t you just pick all 15?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: There were only twelve.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, I added three.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are peanut butter fingers?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well hello! She’s cute! Should we uh, go try to talk to her?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure! That’s one of the great things about being engaged. I’m not nervous talking to pretty girls anymore.

utterance.speaker: The Woman
utterance.content: Could you guys help me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh yeah! Let me, let me get that for you.

utterance.speaker: The Woman
utterance.content: It-it’s really heavy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I got it. So hi, I’m uh, I’m Ross and this is my friend Chandler.

utterance.speaker: The Woman
utterance.content: I-I am Kristen.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Kristen, hi. Are you uh, new to the area, ‘cause if you are…I’d love to show you around sometime.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: I…I uh, actually just moved from four blocks over.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: But-but this block is like a whole other world.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know actually it does have a very interesting history. Uh, this street is the first street in the city to have an underground sewer system. Before that sewage and waste would just flow right down the street. Yeah, sometimes ankle deep!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Smooth.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, say you’re gonna be starving after all this moving. What do you say I take you to dinner tonight?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Oh I’d like that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Great! Uh, let me take this up for you.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: After you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no-no, after you. Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Am I crazy or does this totally go?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! You look so beautiful!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank you Rachel but, look at Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is it. Yeah, this is the one. I can’t believe I found it!

utterance.speaker: The Woman
utterance.content: Wow you look so beautiful! If I knew you, I’d cry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well I’m Monica Geller, ball like a baby.

utterance.speaker: The Woman
utterance.content: I’m Megan Bailey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Have you found your dress yet?

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: Oh no, these dresses are all so amazing but there is no way I could afford one.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, I can’t afford this either. No. I-I-I’m, I’m just to figure out which one I want then I’m gonna get it at Kleinman’s, this discount place in Brooklyn, day after tomorrow they are having a huge sale.

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: Oh, thanks for the tip.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! So-so when are you getting married?

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: Oh I’m not, I just like to try these on.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I do the same thing.

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: I’m just kidding. I’m getting married July 25th.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m just kidding too. I’m getting married in December.

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: So when are you getting married?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh May 15th.

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: Oooh it’s getting close!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: So uh, who’s your photographer?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Jeffery.

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: We met with him. Did he show you the photos of the nude wedding he did?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The best man? Wow!

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: I know! I almost called off my wedding. Oh, who’s your band?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, my fiancee wants the Swing Kings.

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: Oh, you’re so lucky. My fiancee wants the heavy metal band Carcass.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, is that spelled with a ‘C’ or a ‘K’? Oh my God! It doesn’t matter; they’re both great!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh y’know what? Y’know what? Now that you know what you want you should go to Kleinman’s and get it half off. This place is so overpriced.

utterance.speaker: The Woman
utterance.content: I own this store.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So, does this come in another color or…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi! You uh, movin’ in or movin’ out?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: I’m moving in.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh uh, can I give you a hand?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Oh okay. But y’know what? Be careful. Because a guy was helping me before had to leave because he hurt his back.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Boyfriend?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m Joey.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Kristen.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh wow, what a beautiful name! What is it again?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Kristen.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Got it! So…

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: So uh, do you live around here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Yeah! Right down there. Hey listen; let me give you a little tip. Do not take a nap on this stoop or you can wake up with your shoes gone.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: I’ll remember that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Yeah. Listen would you uh, would you like to have dinner with me tonight?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Oh I, I have plans tonight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: But how about tomorrow?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sounds great! Okay all right, well where does this go?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: You look strong, why don’t I take that and you grab one of the boxes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Yeah. Yeah, I’ll grab this one.

utterance.speaker: A Woman
utterance.content: What is taking so long?! I mean whatever!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So this is Brooklyn.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, listen up. There is usually only one dress in each size so when they open those doors, fan out. Now, this is what you’re looking for! Memorize it! When you locate the dress, blow on these. All right? Three short blasts, when you hear it. Come running.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Got it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: A Woman
utterance.content: Here he comes! Hurry!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh they’re pushing! They’re pushing!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Don’t be a baby!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well I…

utterance.speaker: A Woman
utterance.content: Let’s go!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! Rachel! Come on!!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No. No. Not it. Not it. Not it. Don’t crowd me! This is it! This is the dress! Oh my God, it’s perfect! I’m sorry, this one’s taken! Whoa!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Megan!

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You came?!

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is my dress!

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes it is! You saw me wearing it!

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: And now you’ll see me buying it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? You freak! You wouldn’t even have known about this place if it wasn’t for me!

utterance.speaker: Megan
utterance.content: Look, you don’t want to fight me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Maybe I do! I’m pretty feisty!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m coming! I’m coming!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay! Hey! What do I do?!! What are you doing? Did you find the dress?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Did you find the dress?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! You gotta get me out of here Phoebe! These bargain shoppers are crazy!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I—We gotta get Monica.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! You gotta hold my hand!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God!! Excuse me! Excuse me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Go! Go! Go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So Ross, how was your date the other night? Did you tell her about the magical ride that starts with the flush of every toilet?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Laugh all you want but uh, she actually left me a message saying she’d like to go out again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Huh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah in fact, I’m gonna go call her right now. And I’ll make sure to tell her my friend Chandler says…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Listen, sorry I didn’t stop by last night but I had a date.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh Joe, when it’s one o’clock in the morning and you don’t come by? That’s okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well check it out, I was with this really hot girl who just moved in right across the street!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? Right across the street?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: When’d you meet her?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Two days ago.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Excellent! Y’know Ross met somebody too!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi! How’d it go?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh great! We’re going out again Saturday. But I just found she’s also seeing some other guy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?! Joe? What would you do if you were in Ross’s situation?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I sorta am. I mean yeah, I’m dating this girl who’s also seeing another guy. But, I don’t know, I’m not to worried about it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well you shouldn’t be. Believe me I wouldn’t want to be the guy who’s up against you. I mean that doofus is going to lose!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So this is nice! I wish I didn’t have to go, believe me! But unfortunately I have to. Oh uh, by the way, what’s the name the girl you’re dating?

utterance.speaker: Joey and Ross
utterance.content: Kristen Lang.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well obviously only one of us can keep dating her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Obviously! So, how do we decide?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well now let’s-let’s look at this objectively, I think I should date her…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh-huh. Uh-huh. Or, or I’m the one who dates her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s interesting, but check this out. I date her…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah I like that but just to go in another direction…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay. This can go on for a while.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah well we should order some food then.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No Joey! Look why don’t, why don’t we just let her decide? Okay? Hey-hey, we’ll each go out with her one more time. And-and we’ll see who she likes best.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That sounds fair.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Maybe I’ll take her to that new French restaurant down the street…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah yeah—wait a second now! Look we’re gonna have to set a spending limit on the date. I don’t have the money to take her to a fancy place like that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well sorry, that’s what I do on dates.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, well I guess I’ll just have to do what I do on dates.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So let’s decide on the spending limit…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Uh, …a slice……six dollars?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I was thinking more like a hundred.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Can I borrow 94 dollars?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know. Hand me a tissue.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You’re out of Diet Coke.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello? What?! You what?! Hey you listen here missy! Wh—

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That was that girl Megan! She booked the Swing Kings on the day of our wedding and said that I couldn’t have them back unless I gave her the dress!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Does that mean Carcass is available?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What am I gonna do?! That is the dress! That is the dress! Wh…Chandler wants the band. What do I do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well just figure out a way to talk him out of it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You’re out of toilet paper!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I just wanted to come by and y’know, wish you good luck on your date.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh thanks!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. What time are you meeting her?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We have 8:00 reservations at Grammercy Bistero.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow, that’s in like 20 minutes. You’d better get dressed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am dressed.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh. Well good! For me. What is this? Did you give yourself a facial?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I have an oily T-zone!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay dude! Hey you uh, you sent Kristen flowers.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You spent a hundred dollars. That’s the limit. You’re screwed!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh actually, I sent the flowers before the actual date. So techincally, technically I didn’t break any rules. Thanks for stopping by though.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-oh! So that’s the way it’s gonna be huh? Yeah I can break the rules too y’know!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah? What are you gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why am I not surprised?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know what Ross? I’m not gonna let you get away with this!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t think you have much choice.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well we’ll see!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Bye-bye!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah bye-bye! Hey! So just a light layer?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes. Yes. Just here and there .

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey got meat sauce on the banister again!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, swing music is so out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, he’s gotta be in the room for that to work.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you guys talking about?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well umm, we were just talking about the y’know, the Swing Kings and just wondering whether y’know, they were the right way to go.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I went to a wedding once where they had swing music and uh, two months later the couple got divorced. And now I’m not saying that there’s any connection here y’know, but they did tell me that’s why they got divorced.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But I love swing music!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah but the Swing Kings? Y’know they suck so much that people actually die at their concerts—They just stop living.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look all I know is when Monica and I went to see them, we had fun! And there’s another reason too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, what is the other reason?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t want to say.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well you have to because maybe it’s stupid.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well it’s just while Monica and I were dancing to them it was…the first time I knew that…you were the woman I wanted to dance all my dances with.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh crap!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So they said our table will be ready in just a few minutes.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Oh great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Is your back feeling better?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah it’s fine. I guess the more muscles you have the more they can spasim out of control.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Kristen?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Hi! What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh I like this place. And technically, technically I’m not breaking any rules so I…

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Well uh, Ross? This is Joey. Joey? Ross.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi. It’s nice to meet you. I used to have a friend named Joey. I don’t anymore.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Our table will be ready in a couple minutes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. So…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure! I would love to wait with you guys! Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So Joey umm, you look familiar. Are uh, are you on TV or something?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Well Joey doesn’t like to talk about it but, he’s one of the stars of Days Of Our Lives.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s right! That’s right, don’t you play a woman?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A woman in a man’s body.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Much better.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So y’know Ross it’s funny ‘cause, you look familiar to me too. Have you ever been married?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well yes, yes I have. In fact umm, just the other day Kristen and I were talking about how I’ve been married and how I have a son.

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Yeah, little Eric.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s right! Wait no, Ben.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So you’ve just married the one time then?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well umm…

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: You’ve been married twice?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes. And another time after that. Boy I’m getting hungry! Hey Joey, have you ever been so hungry on a date that when a girl goes to the bathroom you eat some of her food?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: You said the waiter ate my crab cake.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. So uh Ross, well now—why did that first marriage breakup? Was it because the woman was straight or she was a lesbian?

utterance.speaker: Kristen
utterance.content: Do you two know each other?

utterance.speaker: Joey and Ross
utterance.content: No. No.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. It just seems like Ross is the kind of a guy that would marry a woman on the verge of being a lesbian and then push her over the edge.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait a minute! Were you on a poster for gonorrhea?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Have you ever slept in the same bed as a monkey?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey you leave Marcel out of this!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fine! Have you ever got stuck in a pair of your own leather pants?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey-hey have you ever locked yourself in a TV cabinet VD boy?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Monkey lover!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: When do you think we lost her?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Probably around gonorrhea.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi, honey! I’m home!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Don’t come in here!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why? Do you another boyfriend in there or something?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! We only mess around at his place!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know it’s funny I started it but, now it’s scary me. So could you come out here please?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, I’m wearing a wedding dress.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh you got a wedding dress? That’s great!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah but I’m not keeping it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well then why can’t I see it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh. I guess you can. Okay but; I-I have to return it, so you can’t like it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay I promise. I’ll-I’ll hate it. Wow! You-you look…hideous.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s like the most ugliest dress I’ve ever seen. Wh-why do you to return it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh because it doesn’t…really fit. Oh by the way, I-I booked the Swing Kings.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that’s great! Great! Thanks! But that dress I mean it’s like yuck! It’s terrible! It makes me wanna just rip it right off of you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay! But you can’t rip it. Well, maybe a little.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey guys! Do you wanna look at the song list for the wedding? Guys?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I thought you were gonna be gone all day.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right? What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m sorry. I’m sorry. I-I should probably leave you girls alone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, laugh all you want but in ten minutes we’re gonna have younger looking skin!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Y’know, she could use a little… Oh nice shot!!!
